HELLO
loan offer to business people.
You are in a financial bind and all attempts to regain control were a failure .It need money to grow your business. You had to explain late payments, loss of debt, divorce or job or another. This is not an impossible situation, or you might have a second chance at GLOBAL FINANCE. From now you can avail the loan of 10 thousand to 50 million .All funding for a well-defined project. If you are in need, please contact us.
e-mail: global_finance@laposte.net
thanks for your understanding

p.17,000 - Vykhino, Moskva, Russia

1 single room in 2-rooms flat.
metro Vykhino - 700 meters. Price - just 17 000 rubles (without other money, like deposits, commission, etc.)
Normal conditions, clean apartment. In other room - your neighbors - young couple.
Quiet area near the park and church. In the room: double bed, wardrobe, mirror, new window, etc. In the flat you can use washing machine, microwave, multicooker, oven. Toilet/bath separated. No balcony. No pets. Check-out date -  April 20.
Snaiperskaya Street
